items.content_html: Minimalist Calendar is a lightweight, customizable calendar component built using vanilla JavaScript and CSS. It allows you to create and manage a calendar with features like date selection, month navigation, and a responsive design.
items.title: smartynow/minimalist-calendar: Minimalist Calendar is a lightweight, customizable calendar component built using vanilla JavaScript and CSS. It allows you to create and manage a calendar with features like date selection, month navigation, and a responsive design.

items.content_html: A lightweight and flexible command-line interface (CLI) tool designed to streamline workflows, automate tasks, and provide customizable utilities for developers. Built with scalability and ease of use in mind, this CLI integrates seamlessly with your development environment to enhance productivity and simplify common operations.
items.title: qodalis-solutions/qodalis-angular-cli: A lightweight and flexible command-line interface (CLI) tool designed to streamline workflows, automate tasks, and provide customizable utilities for developers. Built with scalability and ease of use in mind, this CLI integrates seamlessly with your development environment to enhance productivity and simplify common operations.

items.content_html: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Rocket and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.
items.title: ljt019/exhibit_manager: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Rocket and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.

items.content_html: A lightweight, self-hosted authentication and authorization solution for .NET WebAPI, providing local accounts, role management, and SSO support with minimal setup.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript library to convert PDF pages into high-quality images (PNG, JPG, WebP) with real-time progress tracking and optional ZIP compression and support for concurrent processing.
items.title: pardnchiu/pdf2image: A lightweight JavaScript library to convert PDF pages into high-quality images (PNG, JPG, WebP) with real-time progress tracking and optional ZIP compression and support for concurrent processing.

items.content_html: ng-react-bridge is a lightweight Angular package that enables seamless integration of React components into Angular applications. It uses a directive to render React components, allowing dynamic prop passing and compatibility with standalone Angular components. This tool is ideal for hybrid projects needing both frameworks.
items.title: john310897/ng-react-bridge: ng-react-bridge is a lightweight Angular package that enables seamless integration of React components into Angular applications. It uses a directive to render React components, allowing dynamic prop passing and compatibility with standalone Angular components. This tool is ideal for hybrid projects needing both frameworks.

items.content_html: The NodeJS reference implementation of BLEST (Batch-able, Lightweight, Encrypted State Transfer), an improved communication protocol for web APIs which leverages JSON, supports request batching by default, and provides a modern alternative to REST.
items.title: jhuntdev/blest-js: The NodeJS reference implementation of BLEST (Batch-able, Lightweight, Encrypted State Transfer), an improved communication protocol for web APIs which leverages JSON, supports request batching by default, and provides a modern alternative to REST.

items.content_html: use-next-sse is a lightweight and easy-to-use React hook library for implementing Server-Sent Events (SSE) in Next.js applications, enabling real-time, unidirectional data streaming from server to client.
items.title: alexanderkasten/use-next-sse: use-next-sse is a lightweight and easy-to-use React hook library for implementing Server-Sent Events (SSE) in Next.js applications, enabling real-time, unidirectional data streaming from server to client.

items.content_html: A lightweight web interface for yt-dlp, featuring a clean dark theme design and real-time download progress tracking. Built with NodeJS, HTML, CSS and JS.
